show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: Bonus 7 Bob Kinford at the Flying W, after dinner
subtitle: Bonus 7 Bob Kinford at the Flying W, after dinner
summary:
After a long day in the saddle on the beautiful Flying W Ranch in the Flint Hills of Kansas and a wonderful meal, seven of us sat down on the porch in the last light of day to listen to Bob, Jake and David tell cowboy stories. Things got really good after I turned the recorder off!

Bob is for sure on the list for future guests, come to our Facebook group and leave a question for him!
